ComicInfo.Title: Hard Copy; Trial by Fire; Misdirection; Bash
ComicInfo.Penciller: Fran Bueno,Gabe Bridwell,Jack Lawrence,Mahmud A. Asrar
ComicInfo.Inker: Fran Bueno,Gabe Bridwell,Jack Lawrence,Mahmud A. Asrar
ComicInfo.Summary:
Hard Copy: Maddie directs the team to discredit a reporter who claims to have a secret about Dynamo 5.
Trial by Fire: During their training phase, the young heroes fight a band of new super-villains, not knowing that they are the Noble family in disguise, testing their abilities under Maddie's instructions.
Misdirection: During a multi-hero confrontation with Tog-Mar, the Living Landscape, Chrysalis uses the opportunity to rob a bank. Captain Dynamo figures it out and stops the robbery, but allows his lover Chrysalis to escape before Maddie, his wife, arrives to arrest her.
Bash: During a party at the Nobles' mansion, gossip spreads and Captain Dynamo's obnoxious attitude toward women causes trouble.
